attributes.action: MAKE ALL INTERNATIONAL FOOTBALL GAMES TELIVISED FOR FREE!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I AM SICK OF NOT SEEING IMPORTANT GAMES LIKE THE LATEST WORLD CUP QUALS,DUE TO GREEDY TV COMPANIES MAKING THEM PAY PER VIEW. WERE A PROUD NATION AND WE LOVE OUR NATIONAL GAMES.

NATIONAL GAMES SHOULD BE FREE FOR ALL TO ENJOY. SO SIGN TODAY!

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
